name: Fruity Space (Design_Hotline)
description: Remember  the classic game asteroids. You, a small ship, shooting asteroids. Now you a man in space, who has an addiction to fruits, and is being chased by asteroids. Did I mention it's difficult as hell? Move with wasd. If you hold the buttons, you move faster. Press space to shoot in the direction you're facing, Hold space for auto shoot.  Try to live. Eat fruits to increase your timer, and kill every fucking asteroid to win.
